item.description:
Free Intro to Wicca Discussion
at Terrapin Traders
In Gardner, Mass

Come join us for a FREE Intro to Wicca discussion group on Wednesday,
September 3rd from 7:00- 9:00 pm
to find out what Wicca really is, and what it is NOT.

Learn about the Wiccan beliefs and misconceptions, and some interesting tidbits that most people don't know!

This discussion group is for beginners who want to learn about
what Wicca is truly about, and also for those more advanced in the craft who would like to join the discussion and learn more about the class content of my upcoming Witchcraft Training series that begins September 17th will also be reviewed.

Each course builds upon another, and upon completion the student will obtain the knowledge to the Level of the First Degree.

Look forward to a night of questions and discussions

Come join us!
item.name: Free Intro To Wicca Discussion
